subject: Re: Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope
author: overunder21
full_text:
Definately interested in how this turns out.  I really want to 
experiment with the RS mods - I have an old laptop that is useless 
for anything other than sound recording and word processing, a bunch 
of miscellaneous audio equipment (im an audiophile) and i'm getting 
several of the radios to tweak with in hopes to find what works best 
and random seeding was something that I was wondering about.

I was thinking again about white noise generation using something 
like the echo box and relized that an old analog effects processor 
for musicians (i'm an ex-sound tech and dj, so its how i think) could 
be perfect - running the raw signal from the radios through say a 
delay pedal, an echo box, flanger, phaser, etc to generate more of a 
white tone and try to eliminate anything that could be considered 
just radio transmissions.  Besides, that gives whoever it is another 
piece of simple electronics to tweak with to communicate.
